posts.message:
#jobs
#وظائف
#شير_فى_الخير

- Junior Quality Assurance Engineer
- Database Administrator
- System Analyst
===============================================
Looking for Quality Assurance Junior Engineer for an international life insurance company located in 5th settlement;

To ensure that all the systems are implemented by system departments and are free from errors, high quality, user friendly, and supports business needs

QUALIFICATIONS:

Bachelor Degree in Computer Science.
Experience: 0-2 years of experience in the same field.
Results Oriented.
Great Attention to details.
Familiar with desktop and web based applications.
General knowledge of server and client hardware.
Familiar with all stages of Software Quality Assurance testing, including functional, regression, integration, and performance testing.
Have background of TFS and automation testing.

If interested kindly send your resume at jobseeker@elite-jobs.net and mention the title of the job in the title.

===============================================

Looking for Junior Database Administrator for an international life insurance company located in 5th settlement;
DUTIES & Responsibilities
· Maintain and administer all Oracle/MSSQL testing servers/databases
· Perform Backup, Recovery, Migrations, Scripts and batches on different databases
· Create and deliver database testing servers
· enrolling new users to the system and maintain user’s security roles and access
· User support (Email – Phone – Intranet Requests)
· Update and maintain team procedures

QUALIFICATIONS:

· Good knowledge of oracle DB and MSSQL DB administration.
· Experience: 0-2 years of experience in the same field.
· Computer science or equivalent Bachelor Engineering Degree
· SQL Fundamentals Course (Required).
· Oracle Workshop 1 (Preferred).
· Oracle Workshop 2 (Preferred).
· Good knowledge and use of MS office tools.
· Good knowledge and use of Microsoft Windows Servers.

If interested kindly send your resume at jobseeker@elite-jobs.net and mention the title of the job in the title.

===============================================

Looking for a System Analyst for an international life insurance company located in 5th settlement;

To study, analyze and design Systems Solutions that improve the business efficiency and productivity. Solutions should conform to CIL’s Systems standards, IT Industry Best Practice and aligned with the business objectives

QUALIFICATIONS:

Bachelor Degree in Computer Science.
Experience: 0-2 years of experience in the same field.
Good understanding of Agile Standards
Good interpersonal skills
Effective documentation skills
Good conceptual ability and skills in analysis and problem solving
Good knowledge for Object Oriented concepts
Good Knowledge for .Net framework, web development and RDBMS
Expert experience in SW Analysis/Design.
Expert experience in UML Diagrams/Tools
Experience in DB Conceptual/Physical Design (ERD/DDL)
Automated testing tools experience are a plus
Great Understanding for Systems Release Delivery Process and Project Management methodologies
Great Understanding for different techniques and best practices for System Analysis, requirements gathering and technical writing.

If interested kindly send your resume at jobseeker@elite-jobs.net and mention the title of the job in the title.
And who said C wasn't fun
